a:t.name: complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose"= "Primary series") = 1

expression.name: One Hib primary series dose was administered

def.name: Second Hib dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: " = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Hib dose 2 Expiration

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" + 6 years

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hib dose 2

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the Hib dose 2

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1 AND "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type"= "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Dose number" = 1) − "Date of birth" < 1 year AND Today's date − "Date of birth" ≤ 5 years

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")

def.name: One Hib booster dose was administered. Hib immunization schedule has been completed

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose"= "Booster dose") = 1

a:t.value: Hib booster dose Expiration

a:t.value: "Date of birth" + 6 years

a:t.value: Hib booster dose

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the Hib booster dose

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose"= "Primary series") = 2 AND Today's date − "Date of birth" ≤ 5 years

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")
